cluster_relations.rel_desc: Gestures are described as an aspect or component of body language.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a part, aspect, or modality of the larger whole, system, or process represented by the object.
remarks: Direction set from gestures to body language as part-to-whole.
Direction set from gestures to body language as part-to-whole.
Direction set from gestures to body language as part-to-whole.
Direction set from gestures to body language as part-to-whole.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Facial expressions are implicitly framed as one aspect of body language, with gestures being 'another' aspect.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a part, aspect, or modality of the larger whole, system, or process represented by the object.
remarks: Relation partly inferred from discourse structure; semantics match standard definition of body language.
Relation partly inferred from discourse structure; semantics match standard definition of body language.
Relation partly inferred from discourse structure; semantics match standard definition of body language.
Relation partly inferred from discourse structure; semantics match standard definition of body language.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Nonverbal cues constitute a substantial portion of overall communication.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a part, aspect, or modality of the larger whole, system, or process represented by the object.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Signals sent via body language are part of the communication process.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a contributing component, modality, or channel within the larger process or system represented by the object.
remarks: Relation semantics chosen to indicate inclusion of signals in communication.
Relation semantics chosen to indicate inclusion of signals in communication.
Relation semantics chosen to indicate inclusion of signals in communication.
Relation semantics chosen to indicate inclusion of signals in communication.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a part, aspect, or modality of the larger whole, system, or process represented by the object.
args.justification: This relation expresses the same generic part-whole semantics as the other three instances (a communication channel as a component of the overall communication process). To avoid over-fragmentation of relation classes and to keep canonical predicates consistent, its rel_cls should align with the other component_whole_relation instances, and the canonical_rel_desc should be unified across all uses of is_component_of.
args.remark: Normalized this instance to the same component_whole_relation class and shared canonical description as other is_component_of relations in this cluster.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a part, aspect, or modality of the larger whole, system, or process represented by the object.
executed_decisions.justification: This relation expresses the same generic part-whole semantics as the other three instances (a communication channel as a component of the overall communication process). To avoid over-fragmentation of relation classes and to keep canonical predicates consistent, its rel_cls should align with the other component_whole_relation instances, and the canonical_rel_desc should be unified across all uses of is_component_of.
executed_decisions.remark: Normalized this instance to the same component_whole_relation class and shared canonical description as other is_component_of relations in this cluster.
